/*Use [ws-ent-syn-serverlessdb-001]

CREDENTIAL = [ManagedIdentityCredential])
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET) 
GO */
